quotes.text: The most important thing in life is not the situation, but your attitude towards the situation.
quotes.author: Victor Frankl

quotes.text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: To succeed, you must learn to prepare yourself before the opportunity arrives.
quotes.author: Henry Ford
